jobs_results.title: Senior IOS Engineer
jobs_results.description:
Yassir is the leading super App in the Maghreb region set to changing the way daily services are provided. It currently operates in 45 cities across Algeria, Morocco and Tunisia with recent expansions into France, Canada and Sub-Saharan Africa. It is backed (~$200M in funding) by VCs from Silicon Valley, Europe and other parts of the world.

We offer on-demand services such as ride-hailing and last-mile delivery. Building on this infrastructure, we are now introducing financial services to help our users pay, save and borrow digitally.

Helping usher the continent into a digital economy era. We‚Äôre not just about serving people - we‚Äôre about creating a marketplace to bring people what they need while infusing social values.

About the role
‚Ä¢ We are looking for a senior iOS developer to join our tech hub in Berlin and support our growth and expansion. You will be part of the engineering team, working with a high-quality code base and the latest tools, where you will promote your skills to be an expert in complex frontend development in iOS (swift). Your primary focus will be the development of mobile applications and their integration with back-end services. You will be working alongside other engineers and developers working on different layers of the infrastructure.

About your role as a iOS mobile developer
‚Ä¢ Design and build mobile applications using iOS (swiftUI) platform.
‚Ä¢ Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with a team to define, design, and ship new features
‚Ä¢ Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs
‚Ä¢ Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization
‚Ä¢ Participate in brainstorming sessions and contribute ideas to our technology, algorithms and products.
‚Ä¢ Work with the engineering and design teams to understand end-user requirements, formulate use cases, and then translate that into a pragmatic and effective technical solution
‚Ä¢ Dive into difficult problems and successfully deliver results on schedule

About your experience
‚Ä¢ Must have technical skills with at least 5 years of experience
‚Ä¢ Language: iOS (swift) native, and Swift UI
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with cloud message APIs and push notification
‚Ä¢ Web architecture: Rest and restful APIs, micro-services
‚Ä¢ Version control: GIT
‚Ä¢ Nice to have technical skills (Strongly advised)
‚Ä¢ Containers: Docker, kubernetes
‚Ä¢ Caching, Redis server
‚Ä¢ Scaling, Web load balancing
‚Ä¢ Experience in a rapidly growing company in the mobility, on-demand or fintech space is a plus
‚Ä¢ BSc/MSc in Engineering, Computer Science or relevant field

Why you should join Yassir
‚Ä¢ üòé You will be part of one of the first Algerian startups to go through the Y Combinator program and one of the fastest-growing tech companies in North Africa. We are current in +30 cities (Algeria, Tunisia, Morocco, Senegal, France and Germany)
‚Ä¢ üí∏ Attractive salary and you even get a stake in the company
‚Ä¢ üöâ Subsidized public transit pass
‚Ä¢ ü§ôüèΩHave a lasting impact on our company's culture
‚Ä¢ üöÄ Perfect timing with renowned investors to build something great
‚Ä¢ üìà Extremely steep learning curve with own responsibility and intensive guidance
‚Ä¢ üíØ Make a real impact on the world by helping us bring affordable financial and on-demand services to millions of Africans

At Yassir, we believe in the power of diversity and the importance of an inclusive culture. So, if you're ready to bring your unique perspective and experiences to the table, then we're excited to listen.

Don't just apply for a job, come and be a part of our journey. Let's create a better tomorrow together.

We look forward to receiving your application!

Best of luck,

Your Yassir TA Team

jobs_results.title: iOS Software Engineer - (Hybrid)
jobs_results.description:
As you contemplate your future, you might be asking yourself, what‚Äôs the next step? Start your journey with us! We‚Äôre seeking an experienced iOS Software Engineer to join our Convert area, an area that is at the heart of what the customer experiences when searching and booking their travel on our ecommerce platform. You will directly shape what more than 1 billion website visitors see across 46 countries, and how easy it is for them to book in our mobile app. Our app, with one of the highest ratings among travel apps (4.6 *), has a cash-free rate of 99.9% with 70K active users and 7K daily downloads. So your work will have a massive impact.

What you will do:
The Role‚Äôs Key Responsibilities and Tasks
‚Ä¢ Build a single core application for all the different eDreams ODIGEO brands.
‚Ä¢ Work with a top-notch tech stack including Swift, Objective-C, SwiftUI, XCTests, Fastlane, Cocoapods, Jenkins+CicleCI (for Continuous Integration), Viper (Clean Architecture).
‚Ä¢ Decide with the rest of team members about architecture and best practices.
‚Ä¢ Work with our integration tools to speed up the development of the new features.
‚Ä¢ Be part of a high performing cross functional team of 7-10 developers, POs, UXers, QAs, data scientists etc, all sharing the same values and focus on the customer.
‚Ä¢ Continuously learn and participate in workshops, hackathons and other events as we consider key to be active within the IT community.
‚Ä¢ Work with a distributed, scalable microservices platform, where software gets deployed daily, with high quality, clean code, SOLID principles and design patterns.
‚Ä¢ Be fully independent when working with the modules your team owns ‚Äì across all the phases of the SDLC.
‚Ä¢ Work with talented colleagues who will mentor you and help you develop your career super fast.
‚Ä¢ Provide solutions to complex problems ‚Äì by understanding the problem and the system it sits in, and working with our most senior people to find the best solution that is robust, scalable and has good performance in a high load environment.
‚Ä¢ Work in a fully agile organisation, using Kanban practices to deliver business value continuously, experimenting to deliver more value and be more efficient. Actively participate in team ceremonies and events, as well as product definition and ideation processes.
‚Ä¢ Code the solutions, on a module scope, with the highest quality through good design, attention to detail and test quality.
‚Ä¢ Own and monitor the performance of product and technical OKRs.
‚Ä¢ Challenge decisions, be proactive and seek to improve technical excellence.

What you need to succeed:
Good to have

Here‚Äôs what you need to succeed:

Must haves:
‚Ä¢ Passion for new technologies and clean architecture.
‚Ä¢ Experience with Swift, Objective-C, CocoaPods, as well as Unit Tests.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of the criteria for mobile applications design (usability and interaction).
‚Ä¢ Product mindset and focus on user experience.
‚Ä¢ At least a B2 level in English and willingness to work with a talented multicultural team.
‚Ä¢ Team player, flexible, easy going, proactive and supportive.

Nice to haves:
‚Ä¢ Have experience working in an Agile environment.
‚Ä¢ Worked with Continuous Integration tools (e.g. Jenkins).
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of Core Data, UI testing, frameworks.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of Online Continuous Integration Tools like Bitrise, CircleCI, etc.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of other mobile languages or platforms.
‚Ä¢ Previous experience participating in open source software projects.

Apply now!

We are an equal-opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate based on race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status or disability status. Our people are the key to our success. Each one of them is unique in their own way and the respect for their uniqueness is and will always be a passion and motivation. Don‚Äôt meet every requirement? If you‚Äôre excited about this role but you do not feel your experience aligns perfectly with all the requirements we strongly encourage you to apply nevertheless.
#J-18808-Ljbffr

jobs_results.title: Senior Mobile Developer - React Native (m/f/d)
jobs_results.description:
OSAPIENS ‚Äì Join us in building a sustainable future!

At osapiens, we are committed to empowering businesses economically while promoting human rights and establishing ecologically sustainable and responsible corporate governance as a global standard.

We support global enterprises in over 60 countries in integrating sustainability and positioning themselves for the future. To achieve this, we develop comprehensive SaaS solutions that create transparency and sustainable growth across the entire value chain, meet ESG requirements, and automate manual processes.

Your Experience

Must-have:
‚Ä¢ 5+ years of experience with 3+ years focused on React Native
‚Ä¢ Strong architecture knowledge (storage concepts, design, React Native specific)
‚Ä¢ Strong knowledge in JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Composition, Memorization, Reactivity, Java
‚Ä¢ Experience implementing multiple, different React Native applications
‚Ä¢ Strong communication skills

Nice-to-have:
‚Ä¢ Experience with React Native for Windows
‚Ä¢ Knowledge about native developments
‚Ä¢ Experience in setting up full React Native projects from scratch
‚Ä¢ End-to-end testing experience
‚Ä¢ Experience setting up/maintaining CI/CD pipelines
‚Ä¢ Experience in guiding/leading other developers

Join us for this and more...
‚Ä¢ A purpose-driven mission with and for global industry pioneers in tackling complex challenges
‚Ä¢ Room for creativity through collaborative teamwork and an open communication culture
‚Ä¢ Flexibility and team bonding with our hybrid work options
‚Ä¢ Fuel for your growth journey, both personally and professionally
‚Ä¢ Sustainable mobility options, promoting eco-friendly commuting solutions
‚Ä¢ Fun team events and outings with our global teams
‚Ä¢ Inspiring workspaces in Mannheim, Madrid and beyond

Your Mission

This role sits within our Operations Efficiency department where our solutions are built to innovate and optimise the efficiency of a companies day-to-day operations. This has three components:
‚Ä¢ Distribution: Optimise logistics processes, strengthen customer relationships and sales opportunities and reduce a companies environmental impact with our one-stop solution for last-mile distribution.
‚Ä¢ Maintenance: Give a companies maintenance, asset and reliability team the tools and information they need to operate digital efficiently, increase asset availability, improve overall equipment effectiveness and TPM while reducing costs.
‚Ä¢ Service: All-in-one service management software to maximise resource efficiency, improve first time fix rates, net promotor scores, reduce energy, waste and emissions with 360 Field Service Excellence.

Your Responsibilities

You‚Äôll become a pivotal member of one of our development squads within the 35+ member Operations Efficiency team, helping us drive our efforts to deliver the most innovative solutions in our domain as a senior mobile developer.
‚Ä¢ Work across iOS, Android, and Windows platforms to design, implement, and test features for our offline-capable applications, serving field workers in distribution, field service, and maintenance.
‚Ä¢ Lead and participate in the design and development of new features in coordination with the product team to meet the needs of our international customers.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate closely with domain experts to define and develop optimized user experiences and innovative features for our mission-critical applications.
‚Ä¢ Contribute to the enhancement of the mobile app architecture with a performance-minded approach, ensuring robustness and efficiency.
‚Ä¢ Support continuous improvements in methodology and technology, maintain the toolchain and test environments, and ensure high-quality standards by testing and reviewing code developed within the team.
‚Ä¢ Align efforts with the product team and other stakeholders to ensure development goals are met and that project deliverables align with business objectives.
‚Ä¢ Help increase automated test coverage to facilitate reliable and quicker iterations of feature releases, enhancing both process and technical aspects of development.

jobs_results.title: IOS developer‚Äã/remoto
jobs_results.description:
Posici√≥n: iOS developer (remoto)
Location: Centro√±a

¬ø Qui√©nes somos? / About us

Somos un equipo de desarrollo tecnol√≥gico, formado por m√°s de 40 profesionales comprometidos con la calidad del software, productos y servicios que ofrecemos a nuestros clientes.

Si est√°s buscando un proyecto o equipo centrado en la calidad de software, buenas pr√°cticas, con un ambiente de trabajo genial, y compa√±eros de los que poder aprender, divertirte y trabajar codo con codo, ¬°has encontrado la oferta perfecta para ti!

Nos puedes encontrar en:

Nuestro equipo y cultura / Our crew & culture

Todos venimos de entornos y backgrounds tecnol√≥gicos, por lo tanto estamos acostumbrados a trabajar con metodolog√≠as √°giles, as√≠ncronas y con la libertad y flexibilidad que eso supone.

Trabajamos en remoto desde distintas partes del pa√≠s, pero fomentamos mucho nuestra cultura, desde nuestras dailies (con ‚Äúruinas‚Äù incluidas), nuestros random coffees, charlas, formaciones, eventos en persona y mejor no hablamos de nuestros canales de discord‚Ä¶

En definitiva, en Secture cuidamos mucho a nuestro equipo, ambiente y cultura, por lo tanto, buscamos compa√±er@s que busquen lo mismo que nosotros fomentamos activamente.

¬ø Qu√© har√°s en esta posici√≥n? / What‚Äôll you be doing

1er mes | Onboarding

Nos sentaremos contigo para explicarte el negocio, presentarte al equipo, mostrarte c√≥mo trabajamos, las herramientas qu√© utilizamos y ofrecerte todo lo que necesites en los primeros d√≠as de tu incorporaci√≥n.

Nuestro equipo de tecnolog√≠a te ense√±ar√° nuestro stack, conocer√°s a todos los miembros del equipo, todo el contexto necesario para entender el proyecto y el entorno en el que trabajar√°s.

Seguramente entres a mitad de alg√∫n sprint. Arrancamos todos los d√≠as con una daily muy distendida de compa√±√≠a a las 10am, para contar brevemente c√≥mo avanzamos cada uno en nuestros proyectos, y posteriormente cada equipo asiste a sus dailies propias.

En este primer mes tanto tus compa√±eros de desarrollo como nuestros project managers te acompa√±ar√°n y dar√°n soporte con todo lo que necesites para el proyecto en el que vayas a trabajar.

Nos comunicamos principalmente por Discord, documentamos en Drive y Notion y utilizamos meets para las reuniones. Tambi√©n solemos trabajar con Monday, Trello y Jira, en funci√≥n del proyecto.

Durante los siguientes meses

A medida que te vayas familiarizando con el proyecto, el equipo y el stack, podr√°s ayudar a estimar las tareas y desarrollos que nos ayuden a priorizar el backlog proyecto.

Parte de los sprints contendr√°n trabajos de mejora para optimizar el rendimiento, refactorizar, eliminar legacy, evitar cuellos de botella y en definitiva mejorar la escalabilidad a futuro.

Fomentamos activamente que nuestros compa√±er@s aporten propuestas y que si tienen una idea la compartan sin miedo, ya sean mejoras para desarrollos existentes, como nuevas funcionalidades que puedan impactar de forma positiva en los proyectos en los que trabajar√°s.

Como coment√°bamos m√°s arriba, valoramos la capacidad de trabajar en equipo, la buena comunicaci√≥n, la calidad del software y las buenas pr√°cticas.

En Secture no paramos de crecer, por lo tanto, queremos que te conviertas en un pilar del equipo y nos ayudes a seguir construyendo nuestros proyectos, equipo y cultura.

¬ø Qu√© esperamos de ti?
‚Ä¢ Qu√© hayas trabajado al menos 4 a√±os como desarrollador de iOS en equipos de producto y entornos √°giles.
‚Ä¢ Experiencia s√≥lida:
‚Ä¢ Swift + UI Kit
‚Ä¢ Conocimientos de arquitectura de VIPER y MVC
‚Ä¢ Firebase, gesti√≥n de versiones de prueba a trav√©s de la plataforma
‚Ä¢ Extra points:
‚Ä¢ Publicaci√≥n de aplicaciones en la Appstore
‚Ä¢ Experiencia en ventas en app, gesti√≥n de la tienda y sus productos (suscripciones y consumibles)
‚Ä¢ Motivaci√≥n, ganas y compa√±erismo.
‚Ä¢ Trabajar√°s en un proyecto muy atractivo con posibilidad de desarrollo interno.
‚Ä¢ Que disfrutes trabajando en remoto, acostumbrado a una comunicaci√≥n fluida a trav√©s de nuestros canales internos de compa√±√≠a.
‚Ä¢ Capacidad para trabajar en equipo, as√≠ como para ayudar a otros compa√±er@s cuando lo necesiten.
‚Ä¢ Acostumbrado a trabajar mano a mano con equipos de desarrollo y producto, buenas pr√°cticas y metodolog√≠as √°giles.
‚Ä¢ Qu√© busques un proyecto enfocado en la calidad del software, producto y la calidad de equipo.

¬ø Qu√© te‚Ä¶
